title: [Good] Tinder explicitly states what content should not be posted.

tosdr.case: [Good] Tinder explicitly states what content should not be posted.-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr:
Tinder explicitly states what content should not be posted and types of actions that are not allowed, such as any offensive, inaccurate, incomplete, abusive, obscene, profane, threatening, intimidating, harassing, racially offensive, or illegal material, or any material that infringes or violates another person’s rights (including intellectual property rights, and rights of privacy and publicity)....

The following is a partial list of the type of actions that you may not engage in with respect to the Service. You will not:
impersonate any person or entity.
solicit money from any users.
“stalk” or otherwise harass any person.
